name: Parsnip & Carrot Oven Fries
description: These are delicious, with a slightly sweeter taste than potatoes, and just as satisfying!
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400 °F (200 °C).
  2. Cut carrots and parsnips in half, widthwise, and then cut into sticks.
  3. Place in a bowl with seasoning and oil, tossing to coat.
  4. Arrange in a single layer on a crisper. Bake for 20 minutes, until lightly crispy, but cooked.
tips:
Serve your veggie fries standing upright in a teacup, or small stoneware bowl, accompanied by your favourite Epicure dip!

Experiment with other firm root vegetables, like sweet potatoes and yams. Cooking time may vary.
